physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe emphysema noted on CT scan. Lung function showed mild airway obstruction (FEV1/FVC = 53%; FEV1 = 2.77 L, 73% predicted; FVC = 5.19 L, 109% predicted), significant air trapping (residual volume = 3.02 L, 135% predicted), and severely reduced gas transfer (DLCO = 3.96 mmol/min/kPa, 37% predicted).
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: There was a steady decline in lung function over 13 years.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Lung function testing and CT appearance similar to brother's; FEV1 = 0.91 L (25% predicted), DLCO = 3.41 mmol/min/kPa (32% predicted) noted at 6 years post-diagnosis.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Steady deterioration in lung function leading to exercise limitation of 20 yards.
